title: "AI Assistants Like Siri Give Terrible CPR Advice, Study Says"
excerpt: "That’s why AI voice assistants like Google Home, Amazon’s Alexa, or Apple’s Siri offer enormous potential in providing instructions for the procedure. A bystander who sees someone who’s not breathing and doesn’t have a pulse could just take out their phone and ask Siri to help even if they don’t know how to administer CPR."
